toolbox.js.name: InPageEdit Toolbox
toolbox.js.author: Dragon-Fish
toolbox.js.description: Add a toolbox in the bottom-right corner of your screen. Let you quickly access frequently used IPE functions.

edit-any-page.js.name: Edit any page
edit-any-page.js.author: Dragon-Fish
edit-any-page.js.description: Add a button into IPE Toolbox that let you edit any page any where

color-preview.js.name: Color preview
color-preview.js.author: Dragon-Fish
color-preview.js.description: Add a box above the edit textarea to quickly preview the hexadecimal color
